entry.title: A strange iPhone 17 photo leak suggests that Apple might be taking a completely new approach.
entry.content:
A strange iPhone 17 photo leak suggests that Apple might be taking a completely new approach.


A recent leak regarding the iPhone 17 has surfaced online, sparking discussions about Apple’s potential shift in design philosophy. The leaked images, which have not yet been officially confirmed, suggest that Apple could be exploring a bold new direction for its flagship smartphone. If accurate, this would mark one of the most radical design changes in years.

One of the most striking aspects of the leak is the alleged departure from Apple’s signature design language. The leaked images depict an iPhone with a completely reimagined form factor, featuring a sleeker, more futuristic aesthetic. The edges appear to be more rounded compared to recent models, hinting at a possible return to a softer, more ergonomic design similar to earlier iterations of the iPhone. Some reports suggest that Apple may also be experimenting with a thinner chassis, which could improve portability while maintaining structural integrity.

Another notable aspect of the leak is the camera placement, which appears to have undergone a significant transformation. Instead of the standard vertical or diagonal camera array, the images show a more centralized or even horizontal arrangement, which could indicate new advancements in photography capabilities. Apple has consistently pushed the boundaries of mobile photography, and this design change might signal the introduction of enhanced computational photography features, improved low-light performance, or even new AI-driven camera enhancements.

The front display also seems to have received an overhaul, with some speculating that Apple may be moving closer to an all-screen design. While the company has gradually minimized bezels over the years, the leaked images suggest a device that is nearly bezel-free, potentially incorporating under-display Face ID technology. If true, this would be a significant step forward in Apple’s quest to create a seamless, uninterrupted viewing experience.

While leaks should always be taken with caution, the images have generated excitement and curiosity among Apple enthusiasts. With each new iPhone iteration, Apple refines its vision for the future of smartphones, and the iPhone 17 could be the most ambitious step yet. As the official announcement is still far off, speculation will continue to build, leaving fans eager to see whether these rumored changes become reality.

link.title: A strange iPhone 17 photo leak suggests that Apple might be taking a completely new approach.

category.term: Putin suggests the 'Ukraine crisis' might have been avoided

entry.title: Putin suggests the 'Ukraine crisis' might have been avoided if Trump were in office.
entry.content:
Putin suggests the 'Ukraine crisis' might have been avoided if Trump were in office.

Russian President Vladimir Putin stated on Friday that the conflict in Ukraine might have been avoided if Donald Trump had been in office at the time. He also expressed his willingness to engage in discussions with the new U.S. president regarding the ongoing situation.

Trump has frequently asserted that the war in Ukraine would not have occurred under his leadership. However, this was the first instance of Putin making a similar claim while also reiterating Trump’s baseless assertion that the 2020 U.S. presidential election was fraudulent.

"I cannot disagree with Trump when he says that if he had not been denied victory in 2020, the crisis in Ukraine that unfolded in 2022 might not have happened," Putin remarked during an interview on a Russian television channel, alluding to the full-scale invasion he personally ordered in February 2022.

Trump has previously claimed that he could resolve the conflict in Ukraine within a single day but later assigned his special envoy for Ukraine and Russia, Keith Kellogg, a 100-day timeframe to negotiate a resolution.

The new U.S. administration has yet to present a detailed strategy for achieving peace in Ukraine. However, earlier this week, Trump mentioned that Ukraine’s President Volodymyr Zelensky had expressed interest in reaching an agreement and suggested that Putin might also be open to negotiations.

"I believe Russia should want to come to an agreement. Maybe they do. From what I hear, Putin would like to meet with me. We’ll arrange a meeting as soon as possible. I would meet immediately because every day without talks, soldiers continue to die on the battlefield," Trump told reporters on Thursday.

Putin appeared receptive to the idea, emphasizing that Russia has always remained open to dialogue.

"As for negotiations, we have repeatedly stated—and I want to stress once again—that we are prepared to discuss the Ukrainian issue," the Russian president said in the interview. The day before, the Kremlin mentioned that it was awaiting signals from Washington regarding potential discussions.

Putin’s remarks came a day after Trump issued a warning about possible new sanctions against Moscow while speaking at the World Economic Forum in Davos.

However, Putin questioned the effectiveness of such measures, arguing that they could negatively impact the U.S. economy. "Trump is not only an intelligent individual but also a pragmatic one. I find it difficult to believe that he would make decisions that could harm the American economy itself," Putin stated.

Later on Friday, Zelensky responded to Putin’s comments, accusing him of attempting to manipulate Trump for his own benefit.

The Ukrainian leader revealed that discussions during Ukraine’s Supreme Commander in Chief Staff meeting had addressed Russia’s military capabilities and Putin’s determination to continue the war while trying to influence global leaders.

"Specifically, he wants to exploit the U.S. president’s desire to establish peace. However, I am confident that Russian manipulation will no longer succeed," Zelensky asserted.

link.title: Putin suggests the 'Ukraine crisis' might have been avoided if Trump were in office.

entry.title: Reliance Jio Introduces Voice and SMS-Only Prepaid Plans Following TRAI’s Mandate
entry.content:
Reliance Jio Introduces Voice and SMS-Only Prepaid Plans Following TRAI’s Mandate


Reliance Jio, India’s leading telecom operator, has rolled out new prepaid plans focused solely on voice and SMS services, in line with the recent directive from the Telecom Regulatory Authority of India (TRAI). This move suggests that tariff reductions are unlikely in the near future, as Jio makes adjustments to its offerings. The newly introduced plans comply with TRAI’s requirement for telecom providers to offer separate Special Tariff Vouchers (STVs) for voice and SMS, enabling customers to pay only for the services they need. The primary objective is to cater to specific user groups, particularly senior citizens and individuals residing in rural areas.

New Jio Prepaid Plans

Jio Value Rs 458 Voice-Only Plan

The most affordable Voice and SMS-exclusive plan from Jio is priced at Rs 458. It provides unlimited voice calls along with 1,000 SMS for a duration of 84 days. In addition, customers receive complimentary access to Jio Apps such as JioTV, JioCinema (non-premium), and JioCloud. Jio may have included these app subscriptions assuming users will access them via Wi-Fi or separate data packs. This plan is categorized under Jio’s ‘Value’ segment.

Previously, a similar plan was available for Rs 479, which included unlimited voice calls, 6GB of data (followed by unlimited data at 64 Kbps), and 1,000 SMS for the same 84-day validity. The revised plan is Rs 21 cheaper but eliminates the data benefit while maintaining voice, SMS, and app subscription features.

Jio Value Rs 1,958 Voice-Only Plan

Jio’s annual Voice and SMS-only plan is now priced at Rs 1,958. It provides 365 days of validity, unlimited voice calling, and 3,600 SMS. Additional perks include access to Jio Apps like JioTV, JioCinema (non-premium), and JioCloud. This plan is also categorized under Jio’s ‘Value’ offerings.

Previously, the corresponding plan was available for Rs 1,899, offering 336 days of validity, unlimited voice calls, 3,600 SMS, 6GB of data, and unlimited data at 64 Kbps after reaching the data cap. The updated version increases the price by Rs 59, removes the data benefit, and extends the validity by 29 days while retaining voice, SMS, and app access.

Plan Revisions and Discontinuations

Prior to these changes, Jio had three plans under its ‘Value’ category. However, with this revision, the telecom operator has reduced its offerings to two voice and SMS-only plans. The third plan, priced at Rs 189, which included unlimited voice calls, 300 SMS, and 2GB of data, has been discontinued. Customers requiring additional data can opt for Jio’s data packs to complement these new Voice and SMS plans.

These updates are accurate as of now, and further modifications, if any, will be reported as they arise.

link.title: Reliance Jio Introduces Voice and SMS-Only Prepaid Plans Following TRAI’s Mandate

category.term: One Injured Antioch High School Shooting

entry.title: The Antioch school shooter partially streamed the Nashville incident live.
entry.content:
The Antioch school shooter partially streamed the Nashville incident live.



Two Dead, One Injured in Antioch High School Shooting

A tragic shooting at Antioch High School in Nashville on Wednesday morning left two students dead, including the shooter, and another student injured. The incident took place in the school cafeteria at approximately 11:09 a.m.

Metro Nashville Police Department (MNPD) spokesperson Don Aaron reported that law enforcement received the first emergency call just two minutes after a 17-year-old student began firing.

Authorities confirmed that the shooter fatally wounded one student before taking his own life. A third student suffered a minor gunshot wound, while a fourth student sustained a facial injury from a fall but was not hit by gunfire. The injured students were transported to Vanderbilt University Medical Center for treatment.

On Wednesday afternoon, MNPD identified the deceased victim as 16-year-old Josselin Corea Escalante and the shooter as 17-year-old Solomon Henderson. The identities of the other students involved are still being determined.

Tragedy Strikes Nearly Two Years After The Covenant School Shooting

This shooting follows a deadly attack nearly two years ago at The Covenant School in Nashville, where three children and three staff members were killed before the shooter was fatally shot by police.

Antioch High School Basketball Games Canceled

As a precautionary measure, Antioch High School’s scheduled boys' and girls' basketball games against Hillsboro High School on Friday have been canceled, according to Metro Nashville Public Schools Athletics Director Mark North.

Shooter’s Online Activity Reveals Troubling Content

Investigators uncovered a 300-page manifesto attributed to the Antioch High School shooter. The document included references to alt-right ideology, explicit praise for Adolf Hitler, and statements against racial integration. It also contained violent rhetoric expressing a desire for revenge against society, as well as images from past school shootings, according to MNPD Chief John Drake.

Authorities linked the shooter to various social media accounts across multiple platforms, including X, Kick, and TikTok. These accounts reportedly contained extremist and misogynistic content associated with white nationalist and "incel" communities.

The document, last updated four hours before the attack, indicated that the shooter originally planned to carry out the attack on Thursday. It also mentioned an intent to kill at least ten people, including a specific elementary school teacher who was not named.

Community Gathers for Vigil

In response to the tragedy, community members, students, and faith leaders assembled Wednesday night at Hamilton United Methodist Church in Antioch. The vigil was interfaith and multilingual, bringing together a diverse group of attendees seeking comfort and solidarity.

Among the speakers were Nashville Mayor Freddie O’Connell, Metro Nashville Councilmembers Delishia Porterfield, Deonté Harrell, and Zulfat Suara. Clergy members, including Revs. Quentin Dickerson, Mamdouh Ramzy, Rachel Booker, and Imam Moaz Roaf from the Islamic Center of Tennessee, also shared words of encouragement.

Aaron Rodriguez, a teacher at Antioch High School, moved many attendees to tears with his speech. Addressing parents in the audience, he assured them, “Your children are brave, and they did everything right.”

Many students and grief counselors attended the vigil, supporting each other through their grief. Councilmember Porterfield emphasized unity, stating, “When we hold hands, when we pray together…we acknowledge we are stronger together.”

Investigation into the Shooting Continues

Authorities are still working to determine a motive for the shooting, which resulted in the deaths of 16-year-old Josselin Corea Escalante and 17-year-old Solomon Henderson. A 17-year-old male student who was wounded has since been treated and released from Vanderbilt University Medical Center.

MNPD has not yet found any clear connections between Henderson and the students who were shot, and investigators believe they may have been struck at random inside the cafeteria.

At the time of the attack, two school resource officers were present on campus but were in a different area of the building. By the time they arrived at the scene, Henderson had already turned the gun on himself.

Detectives are reviewing Henderson’s online posts and writings in collaboration with state and federal agencies. Authorities have not disclosed whether Henderson had any prior interactions with law enforcement.

Shooter Livestreamed Part of the Attack

Kick, a live-streaming platform, confirmed that Henderson broadcasted part of the shooting on his account. In a statement posted on X, the company said, “KICK rapidly banned the account and removed the video. Violence has no place on KICK. We are actively working with law enforcement and taking all appropriate steps to support their investigation.”

Some video clips circulating online show Henderson filming himself walking through school hallways and attempting to enter locked classrooms.

Gun Safety Concerns Raised

Dr. Jonathan Metzl, a sociology professor at Vanderbilt University and director of the Center for Medicine, Health, and Society, expressed concern over Tennessee’s ongoing refusal to implement stricter gun laws.

“We continue to see these tragedies in places where people should feel safe—schools, restaurants, and other public spaces,” Metzl said. “We need to learn from these incidents and implement policies that both protect the rights of gun owners and make schools safer.”

Metzl, author of What We’ve Become: Living and Dying in a Country of Arms, has previously proposed measures such as "red flag" laws and expanded background checks, but these initiatives have not gained traction in Tennessee’s legislature.

Antioch High School Closes for the Week

Metro Nashville Public Schools Director Adrienne Battle announced that Antioch High School will remain closed for the rest of the week to allow students and staff time to process the tragedy.

MNPS is arranging counseling services for students and faculty, though specific details on the location and availability of these resources have yet to be provided.

MNPD Chief: Online Materials Being Reviewed

During a news conference Wednesday afternoon, MNPD Chief John Drake confirmed that online materials connected to the shooter are playing a significant role in the ongoing investigation.

Authorities are still working to determine the shooter's motive, according to Chief John Drake.

"We're investigating that aspect," Drake stated. "There are online materials we're reviewing as part of the case."

He later emphasized the importance of vigilance in preventing such incidents.

"We suspect that some concerning materials were available, and perhaps they were noticed," Drake said. "If someone had spoken up, maybe this could have been prevented."

Metro Nashville Police Identify Victim and Shooter

Metro Nashville Police identified the victim who lost her life as 16-year-old Josselin Corea Escalante and the shooter as 17-year-old Solomon Henderson. The department shared the information on X, formerly Twitter, around 3:30 p.m. Wednesday.

Students and Parents Recall the Tragic Day

Kelisha Walden endured hours of waiting before she could finally embrace her daughter, Yvelle Walden, 16. Tears welled in her eyes as they reunited on Thursday.

For Yvelle, the day began like any other. She attended basketball practice before her morning classes and was heading to lunch when gunshots suddenly rang out.

Her lunch break began at 11:05 a.m.

"Out of nowhere, I just heard gunfire," she recounted.

Frightened, she rushed back to class and told her teacher to lock the door. More than three hours later, she was able to reunite with her mother.

"She ran up and told me not to cry," Kelisha recalled. "I told her: 'Too late.'"

Another student, Edwin Vanegas, 16, walked with a group of classmates to the designated reunification site. Instead of waiting for his family, he opted to meet up with friends before heading home, assuring his loved ones he was safe and didn’t need to be picked up.

Due to the timing of the incident, school officials decided that students who typically take the bus would follow their usual transportation schedule. Those who were car riders, like Vanegas, walked to the reunification site.

Nashville Council Members Respond

Two at-large members of Nashville's city council, Quin Evans Segall and Delishia Porterfield, addressed the tragedy on Bluesky Wednesday afternoon.

Porterfield expressed her condolences to the victims, their families, and those affected by the incident. She voiced concerns about Tennessee’s gun laws.

"This is another heartbreaking example of how unrestricted firearm access continues to endanger our communities," she stated.

She reaffirmed her commitment to establishing an Office of Youth Safety to address gun violence.

"We will not stop working to make our community safer," Porterfield added.

Evans Segall also shared her sorrow and frustration, stating that the tragedy was avoidable.

"This didn’t have to happen," she said. "We could have taken action to prevent it—but we didn’t."

White House Monitoring Situation

The White House confirmed that President Donald Trump and his team were tracking the developments at Antioch High School.

In an official statement, the White House extended thoughts and prayers to those affected and expressed gratitude to first responders for their swift action.

Teacher Used ‘Moana’ to Comfort Students

Special education teacher Chirelle Teufert described the experience as "organized chaos."

As law enforcement worked to secure the scene, she kept her classroom doors locked and blinds shut. To keep her students calm, she played the Disney film "Moana."

Teufert praised her students for their composure and dedicated herself to helping reunite them with their families. "It takes teamwork," she said, "and we have that."

School District Director Addresses the Tragedy

Metro Nashville Public Schools Director Adrienne Battle called it a "dark day" for the school and the entire community.

"My heart breaks for these families experiencing unimaginable loss," she said.

Battle mentioned that Antioch High had security measures in place, such as resource officers, secured entryways, and surveillance cameras with weapon-detection software. She reflected on her own past, recalling a school shooting that occurred when she was a student in 1994.

She commended the school's staff for their quick response. "Their actions were heroic on such a devastating day," she said.

Investigation Continues Overnight

Chief Drake revealed that the shooter, a 17-year-old male student, arrived at school on the bus before heading to the cafeteria, where he confronted and shot a 16-year-old female student.

He then fired multiple rounds before turning the gun on himself.

A 17-year-old male student suffered a grazing wound and was treated at Vanderbilt University Medical Center before being released.

After the shooting, SWAT teams searched the premises for additional victims, but none were found. The motive remains unknown, and the investigation is expected to continue into the early morning hours.

Students Recall Moments of Fear

Tinashae Smith, a ninth-grader, described the terrifying experience of hiding in her classroom. When she saw people running in the hallways, she alerted her teacher, who tried calling the administration but received no response.

After checking their phones, students discovered that a shooting had taken place. A lockdown was initiated, and they barricaded the door with desks and chairs.

"I was scared and confused," Smith said. "Everything happened so fast."

At around 2 p.m., she was finally able to reunite with her sister. "I never want to go through something like this again," she said.

Transportation and Reunification Efforts

Metro Schools provided updates on student transportation. By 2:15 p.m., buses began leaving the reunification site at 3754 Murfreesboro Pike. Students who drove to school would be taken back later to retrieve their vehicles.

Walkers were transported home if their parents couldn’t pick them up. Car riders reunited with their families at the designated site.

Former Student Not Surprised

Nadia Marquez, a former Antioch High student, said she was shocked when she first heard about the shooting but, upon reflection, found it unsurprising.

"There were always threats when I was in school," she said. "I just hoped everyone was okay."

While relieved that her boyfriend’s sister was safe, she acknowledged the emotional toll the event would take on students.

"Some kids are probably in shock or terrified. This kind of trauma stays with you," she said.

Lawmakers and Officials React

Various officials, including Tennessee’s federal representatives and Governor Bill Lee, expressed their condolences. However, Republican lawmakers did not propose any policy changes in response.

Senator Jeff Yarbro called for legislative action, emphasizing the need to create a safer environment for students.

"High school students should be able to eat lunch without fearing for their lives," he said.

Mayor O’Connell’s Statement

Nashville Mayor Freddie O’Connell described the shooting as a heartbreaking moment for the city.

"Our thoughts are with the families, students, and staff," he said. "We will support them however we can."

Community Mourns Another School Shooting

Voices for a Safer Tennessee, a nonprofit advocating against gun violence, expressed their sorrow over the incident.

"Schools should be safe spaces," the organization said in a statement. "We stand with the victims and their families."

Parents' Fear and Frustration

Many parents anxiously waited outside the reunification site. Chante Frye, whose ninth-grade daughter was inside during the shooting, described the experience as terrifying.

"It’s heartbreaking," she said. "And unfortunately, it’s not surprising given the rise in violence at schools."

Police Investigation Ongoing

Authorities continue to investigate the events leading up to the shooting, including whether warning signs were missed. Officers are urging anyone with relevant information to come forward.

link.title: The Antioch school shooter partially streamed the Nashville incident live.

entry.title: How you can lose your over weight naturally
entry.content:
How you can lose your over weight naturally


1. Eat a Balanced Diet

  • Focus on whole, unprocessed foods like fruits, vegetables, lean proteins, whole grains, and healthy fats.
  • Avoid sugary drinks and processed foods that contain excess calories and unhealthy fats.
  • Control portion sizes to prevent overeating.

2. Stay Hydrated

  • Drink plenty of water throughout the day, as dehydration can sometimes be mistaken for hunger.
  • Warm lemon water in the morning can boost metabolism and digestion.

3. Increase Physical Activity

  • Exercise regularly, including a mix of cardio (walking, running, cycling) and strength training.
  • Aim for at least 150 minutes of moderate activity per week.
  • Stay active in daily life—take the stairs, walk more, or do household chores.

4. Get Enough Sleep

  • Lack of sleep can lead to weight gain by increasing hunger hormones.
  • Aim for 7–9 hours of quality sleep each night.

5. Manage Stress Levels

  • High stress can trigger emotional eating and cravings for unhealthy foods.
  • Practice relaxation techniques like meditation, deep breathing, or yoga.

6. Eat Mindfully

  • Avoid distractions while eating (like watching TV).
  • Chew slowly and listen to your body’s hunger and fullness cues. 

7. Avoid Crash Diets

  • Extreme calorie restrictions can slow down metabolism.
  • Focus on long-term, sustainable habits rather than quick fixes.

8. Increase Fiber and Protein Intake

  • Fiber-rich foods (like oats, beans, and vegetables) keep you full for longer.
  • Protein (from eggs, lean meats, nuts, and dairy) helps in muscle maintenance and fat loss.

9. Reduce Sugar and Refined Carbs

  • Cut back on white bread, pasta, sugary snacks, and sodas that cause blood sugar spikes and cravings.
  • Opt for whole foods like brown rice, quinoa, and whole-wheat products.

10. Stay Consistent and Patient

  • Weight loss takes time, so focus on progress rather than perfection.
  • Set realistic goals and celebrate small achievements.

link.title: How you can lose your over weight naturally

entry.title: India vs England 1st T20I LIVE: Varun Chakravarthy Strikes as England Struggles at 75/4 in Kolkata
entry.content:
India vs England 1st T20I LIVE: Varun Chakravarthy Strikes as England Struggles at 75/4 in Kolkata

The much-anticipated first T20I between India and England is underway at Eden Gardens, Kolkata, and the match has already witnessed some thrilling moments. England, after being put to bat, has struggled against India’s disciplined bowling attack, losing crucial wickets at regular intervals.

Varun Chakravarthy Strikes Big

Mystery spinner Varun Chakravarthy has made an impact, dismissing Liam Livingstone, one of England’s most explosive batters. Livingstone, who was looking to accelerate the scoring rate, was undone by Chakravarthy’s sharp spin, adding to England’s troubles. With his dismissal, England finds itself at 75/4, putting India in a strong position.

England’s Early Wicket Woes

England’s innings started with a steady yet cautious approach. However, Indian bowlers struck early to remove key batters, pushing the visitors on the back foot. With power-hitters like Jos Buttler and Phil Salt back in the pavilion, England has been forced to rebuild their innings in the middle overs.

Indian Bowlers in Command

Apart from Chakravarthy, India’s bowlers have been relentless in applying pressure. Arshdeep Singh and Axar Patel have bowled with precision, ensuring England doesn’t get easy runs. The spinners have played a key role in containing the English batters, who are finding it difficult to settle in the conditions.

What’s Next in the Match?

England still has some firepower in the form of Ben Stokes and Moeen Ali, who will be crucial in setting up a competitive total. However, with India’s bowlers maintaining their grip on the game, the visitors will have to bat smartly to post a defendable score.

With the game hanging in balance, stay tuned for more updates as the action unfolds in Kolkata!

entry.title: The Hidden Truth About Electric Vehicle Batteries: Are They Really Reliable?
entry.content:
The Hidden Truth About Electric Vehicle Batteries: Are They Really Reliable?

As electric vehicles (EVs) become more popular, people are starting to ask important questions about the safety and reliability of their batteries. A recent incident involving a Nexon EV Max 2.0 shows just how unpredictable these batteries can be. A driver who had traveled 10,000 kilometers suddenly saw their battery level drop from 10% to just 3%, forcing them to find a fast charger immediately.

Later, after a short charging break and a routine software update, another issue occurred—the battery, which had been at 21%, suddenly fell again to 3%. This raises concerns about how software updates and charging habits affect battery life and performance.

Why Battery Reliability Matters for the Future of EVs

The EV industry is growing fast and could be worth $800 billion by 2027. But for that to happen, consumers need to trust that EVs are reliable. If too many people have negative experiences with battery failures, it could discourage others from switching to electric vehicles.

To build that trust, EV manufacturers must focus on:
– Better battery health monitoring
– Educating users on proper charging habits
– Improving battery management systems

Sustainability and reliability go hand in hand. As new battery technologies and faster charging solutions emerge, EVs should become more dependable, giving consumers peace of mind.

The Bigger Impact of Battery Problems

The rise of EVs is changing society in many ways. More people care about sustainability and expect manufacturers to ensure their products last long and work well. If battery problems continue, it might make people hesitant about switching to electric vehicles.

From an economic perspective, unreliable batteries can hurt the EV industry, which depends on strong consumer confidence. If people lose faith in EVs, manufacturers may face supply chain disruptions and fluctuating demand. At the same time, as fossil fuel use declines, there is a chance for countries to invest more in renewable energy and clean technology.

The environmental impact of battery reliability is also crucial. If EV batteries don’t last long, more of them will end up as waste, reducing the environmental benefits of electric cars. However, advancements in battery recycling and new battery types—such as solid-state batteries—could help reduce waste and improve efficiency.

How Battery Management Systems Help

A good Battery Management System (BMS) is essential to keeping EV batteries safe and long-lasting. These systems:
– Track battery health
– Control charging and discharging cycles
– Prevent sudden failures

A well-designed BMS can help prevent battery issues caused by software updates, incorrect charging habits, and unexpected power drops.

New Developments in Battery Technology

Researchers and manufacturers are working on improvements to make EV batteries safer and more efficient. Some of the latest innovations include:

  1. Advanced Battery Chemistry: Solid-state batteries are being developed to last longer, store more energy, and reduce the risk of fires.
  2. Smart Charging: New charging solutions aim to make charging faster and more convenient.
  3. Real-Time Monitoring: Many EVs now have apps that help users track their battery’s condition and take action before issues arise.

Pros and Cons of EV Batteries

Advantages:
– Zero Emissions: EVs reduce air pollution and greenhouse gases.
– Lower Costs: Electricity is usually cheaper than gasoline, helping drivers save money.
– Regenerative Braking: Some energy is recovered while braking, improving efficiency.

Challenges:
– Battery Degradation: Over time, batteries lose their ability to hold a charge.
– Charging Infrastructure: While improving, charging stations are still not as common as gas stations.
– Expensive Replacements: Battery replacement costs can be high, making ownership difficult for some consumers.

What’s Next for EV Batteries?

As the EV market continues to expand, companies are investing in research to make batteries better. Some promising developments include:

– Lithium-Sulfur Batteries: These could offer more energy storage with less weight.
– Nanotechnology: Scientists are working on ways to make batteries charge faster and last longer.
– AI-Powered Battery Management: Artificial intelligence may soon help optimize charging and prevent battery problems.

Sustainability and Ethical Sourcing

With so many EVs on the road, concerns about battery waste and ethical material sourcing are growing. Companies are working on:

– Battery Recycling: Finding better ways to reuse and recycle old batteries.
– Ethical Material Sourcing: Making sure materials like lithium and cobalt are mined responsibly.

Conclusion

EV batteries are not perfect, but advancements in technology are making them safer, more efficient, and more reliable. For the EV industry to succeed, manufacturers must be transparent about battery health and educate consumers on best practices. As improvements continue, EVs will play a key role in the future of sustainable transportation.

link.title: The Hidden Truth About Electric Vehicle Batteries: Are They Really Reliable?

entry.title: Elon Musk's Gesture at Trump’s Inauguration Event Sparks Controversy
entry.content:
Elon Musk's Gesture at Trump’s Inauguration Event Sparks Controversy

 Washington, D.C. — Elon Musk, the billionaire entrepreneur and CEO of Tesla and SpaceX, found himself at the center of controversy after a hand gesture he made during Donald Trump’s inauguration festivities sparked widespread speculation and debate. 

During the high-profile event, Musk was seen making a gesture that some interpreted as a subtle political statement, while others dismissed it as an innocuous motion caught on camera at the wrong moment. The gesture, captured in a viral video, quickly led to discussions across social media, with some users alleging it carried deeper political or ideological connotations.

Critics and conspiracy theorists speculated that Musk was signaling support for a particular movement or ideology, while his supporters argued that the reaction was overblown. Some experts in body language have weighed in, with mixed interpretations—some calling it a simple reflexive movement and others suggesting it might have been intentional.

Musk, known for his often cryptic and sometimes controversial social media presence, took to X (formerly Twitter) to address the controversy. “People are reading too much into this. Sometimes a hand gesture is just a hand gesture,” he posted, seemingly dismissing the speculation.

Despite his response, the debate continues, with political analysts and media outlets dissecting the footage. The incident adds to the long list of moments where Musk’s actions—whether online or in public appearances—have sparked debate and divided opinions.

While there is no official statement from the Trump camp regarding the matter, sources close to the former president suggest that the incident has not affected Musk’s standing within conservative circles. However, as the controversy lingers, it remains to be seen whether this will have any lasting impact on Musk’s public image or business ventures.

For now, the internet remains abuzz, proving once again that in the age of social media, even the smallest gestures can become major talking points.

link.title: Elon Musk's Gesture at Trump’s Inauguration Event Sparks Controversy

category.term: CM Rio reviews progress at Konyak heritage village in Mon:Nagaland

entry.title: CM Rio reviews progress at Konyak heritage village in Mon.
entry.content:
CM Rio reviews progress at Konyak heritage village in Mon.

Chief Minister Neiphiu Rio recently visited the Konyak heritage village in Mon district

Nagaland Chief Minister Neiphiu Rio recently visited the Konyak heritage village in Mon district to inspect the ongoing development work aimed at preserving and showcasing the rich cultural heritage of the Konyak community. Expressing optimism about the project, Rio shared on X that he looked forward to the site becoming a center for community unity and cultural pride, where people could strengthen their bonds.

As per a report from the Department of Information and Public Relations (DIPR), the chief minister was accompanied by the Minister of Forests, Environment & Climate Change and Village Guard, CL John, along with Nagaland Democratic Progressive Party (NDPP) president Chingwang Konyak. Addressing those present at the heritage site, Rio extended his gratitude to the administration, civil society organizations, landowners, and workers for their contributions to the project so far.

Emphasizing that unity and cooperation are crucial for societal development, Rio urged the local population to continue their support to ensure the successful completion of the heritage village. He also stressed the importance of quality control in the construction process and reminded relevant departments to ensure proper electricity and water supply connectivity to the site. According to him, all construction work is expected to be completed within the next two months, with the inauguration scheduled for the first week of April 2025.

During the visit, Konyak Union (KU) president Tingtok Konyak welcomed the gathering, while Mon Deputy Commissioner Ajit Kumar Verma extended his gratitude to the chief minister and his team for their visit. A brief speech was also delivered by representatives of the Konyak Heritage Management Community, highlighting the cultural and historical significance of the project.

link.title: CM Rio reviews progress at Konyak heritage village in Mon.

entry.title: Fifteen senior members of NPP switch allegiance to Congress.
entry.content:
Fifteen senior members of NPP switch allegiance to Congress.

                                              15 senior NPP members join Congress  

In a significant political development, 15 members from the Nagaland unit of the National People’s Party (NPP) have joined the Congress, as announced by Nagaland Pradesh Congress Committee (NPCC) president and Lok Sabha member Supongmeren Jamir. Speaking at Congress Bhavan, Supongmeren described this transition as a pivotal moment for the party, reinforcing its commitment to grassroots development and transformative change.

NPCC working president Khriedi Theiinuo expressed optimism about the new members’ contribution, emphasizing that their support would help advance the party’s mission. Among the key figures making the switch, NPP vice-president Bitong Sangtam clarified that their decision stemmed not from resentment towards NPP but from aspirations for a more progressive future. He acknowledged the challenges they faced within NPP and the need for new opportunities.

Echoing similar sentiments, NPP general secretary L Hiketo Shohe highlighted the necessity for a shift in Nagaland’s political landscape. He expressed confidence in the Congress’s vision and asserted that their move was driven by careful consideration of public interest. Although Congress currently lacks representation in the Nagaland Legislative Assembly, Hiketo remained hopeful about its prospects in the upcoming elections. He stressed the importance of a strong opposition over being part of a coalition with limited influence.

The group of new Congress members includes NPP vice-president Bitong Sangtam, general secretary L Hiketo Shohe, secretaries Bipin Kumar Sha and Akito Chishi, media secretary to general secretary (Org) Khekai Zhimo, NPP Mahila state executive member Illina Shohe, former DMC candidate Toli S Achumi, National People’s Youth Front vice-president Heto Achumi, NPYF general secretary (Org) Jaser Meru, general secretary (Adm) Justin Lotha, secretary (Org) Akahito Chishi, secretary (Adm) Kavito Swu, secretary Amento Kiba, and members Imtimeren Imchen and Sarah Zhimo.

During the event, NPCC working president Theünuo also addressed the Protected Area Regime (PAR), criticizing its role in isolating Nagaland from the rest of the country. He argued that such restrictions projected a negative perception of the state, hindering investment and development. He assured that Congress would bring this issue to Parliament through Supongmeren Jamir, advocating for policies that foster stronger connections and economic growth.

Additionally, Supongmeren reaffirmed Congress’s stance on the removal of the Free Movement Regime (FMR), which impacts cultural and historical ties among the Naga people across the Indo-Myanmar border. He underscored that the central government recognized these concerns and acknowledged the need for more inclusive policies. With this new wave of members, Congress aims to reinvigorate its presence in Nagaland, pushing for reforms that align with the state’s aspirations.

link.title: Fifteen senior members of NPP switch allegiance to Congress.

category.term: JEE Main 2025 Session 1 is set to commence on January 22:India

entry.title: JEE Main 2025 Session 1 is set to commence on January 22, with NTA issuing important guidelines for candidates.
entry.content:
JEE Main 2025 Session 1 is set to commence on January 22, with NTA issuing important guidelines for candidates.

Candidates appearing for JEE Main 2025 Session 1 must paste a photograph on their admit card and are advised to carry two additional copies to the exam center.

 The first session of JEE Main 2025 is set to begin on January 22, starting with the BE/BTech paper (Paper 1). The exams will be conducted from January 22 to January 30 in two shifts, with the morning session from 9 AM to 12 noon and the second shift scheduled for 3 PM onwards. Paper 2, which includes BArch and BPlanning, will take place exclusively on January 30 in the second shift. The duration of Paper 1 (BE/BTech), Paper 2A (BArch), and Paper 2B (BPlanning) is three hours, while candidates appearing for both BArch and BPlanning papers together will have three hours and 30 minutes.

JEE Main 2025 is being conducted in two phases this year, with the second session scheduled for April. Candidates must undergo frisking and biometric attendance verification, including after toilet breaks. Registration was required through DigiLocker or ABC ID, and those who opted for non-Aadhaar authentication or did not complete the DigiLocker/ABC ID registration must report earlier on the exam day for biometric verification. All candidates must reach the exam center at least an hour before the scheduled time to ensure a smooth entry process.

On the exam day, candidates must carry a printed copy of their JEE Main 2025 admit card along with an original photo identity proof. A passport-size photograph, identical to the one uploaded with the online application, must be pasted on the admit card. It is advisable to bring two additional copies of the photograph for convenience. Another passport-size photograph will be required for the attendance sheet.

Several items are strictly prohibited inside the examination center, including geometry boxes, pencil cases, handbags, purses, papers, stationery, textual material, eatables, water bottles, mobile phones, earphones, microphones, pagers, calculators, docupens, slide rules, log tables, cameras, tape recorders, metallic items, and any electronic gadgets or devices.

Candidates must follow the specified dress code, avoiding metallic accessories such as rings, bracelets, earrings, or any embellishments. Shoes with thick soles are not permitted, and simple, comfortable clothing is recommended. Scarves should also be avoided.

For Paper 2, candidates appearing for the drawing test must bring their own geometry box set, pencils, erasers, and either color pencils or crayons, as watercolors are not allowed on the drawing sheet. Diabetic students are permitted to carry essential eatables such as sugar tablets and fruits like bananas, apples, or oranges, along with a transparent water bottle. However, packaged food items such as chocolates, candy, or sandwiches are not allowed.

Before leaving the examination hall, candidates must drop their JEE Main admit card in the designated drop box. The National Testing Agency (NTA) has stated that failure to submit the admit card will result in the candidate’s answers not being evaluated.

link.title: JEE Main 2025 Session 1 is set to commence on January 22, with NTA issuing important guidelines for candidates.

entry.title: Trump directs U.S. withdrawal from the leading global climate agreement.
entry.content:
Trump directs U.S. withdrawal from the leading global climate agreement.

The United States will be among just four countries not participating in the Paris Agreement, which aims to curb global greenhouse gas emissions.
In 2021, a coal-fired power plant in Kansas highlighted the challenges U.S. efforts to reduce emissions were facing, even before President Trump's announcement.

On Monday, President Trump signed an executive order withdrawing the United States from the Paris Agreement, a global pact aimed at combating climate change. This decision places the U.S. alongside Iran, Libya, and Yemen as one of the few nations not part of the accord, which seeks to prevent global warming from reaching catastrophic levels.

The withdrawal, part of a series of energy-related decisions announced shortly after his inauguration, marks another shift in the country’s stance on international climate agreements. Trump had previously pulled the U.S. out during his first term, only for President Biden to rejoin the pact in 2020 upon taking office.   

Critics, including scientists, activists, and Democratic officials, condemned the move, warning that it could exacerbate the climate crisis and negatively impact American workers. In conjunction with other energy policies unveiled on the same day, the decision underscores the administration’s commitment to increasing fossil fuel extraction and production while moving away from clean-energy advancements such as electric vehicles and wind power generation.

link.title: Trump directs U.S. withdrawal from the leading global climate agreement.

category.term: Martin Luther King Jr. Day is a U.S. holiday and day of service

entry.title: Martin Luther King Jr. Day is both a U.S. holiday and a national day of service, but it took the nation many years to officially recognize it.
entry.content:
Martin Luther King Jr. Day is both a U.S. holiday and a national day of service, but it took the nation many years to officially recognize it.


The Rev. Martin Luther King Jr. delivered his iconic "I Have a Dream" speech in 1963 on the steps of the Lincoln Memorial, a location he chose to honor President Abraham Lincoln, whom he described as "a great American, in whose symbolic shadow we stand today." Today, millions honor King in a similar way.

Each year, Martin Luther King Jr. Day is observed on the third Monday of January, close to his January 15 birthday. Federal, state, and local governments, along with various institutions and industries, recognize the holiday. While some see the day as time off from work or school, King’s family and those dedicated to his legacy of equality, justice, and non-violent protest emphasize that the holiday is meant to be a time for service and helping others.

Although now a widely accepted tradition, the holiday faced significant resistance before its official establishment. The idea of a national holiday to honor King emerged in the aftermath of his assassination on April 4, 1968, in Memphis, Tennessee. Four days later, U.S. Democratic Representative John Conyers of Michigan, a long-serving congressman known for his advocacy for civil rights, proposed legislation to recognize King.

Gaining support for the holiday was not easy. King was a polarizing figure during his lifetime. Many Americans, influenced by his speeches on poverty, housing, and opposition to the Vietnam War, viewed him as too radical. Polls from the Washington Post and the New York Times indicated widespread distrust of him, with some believing his work should have ended after the passage of the Voting Rights Act in 1965.

For the next 15 years, the Congressional Black Caucus, founded by Conyers, pushed for the legislation. Opponents cited various reasons, including the claim that public holidays should not honor private citizens. Others falsely labeled King a communist or criticized his personal life. Meanwhile, Coretta Scott King persistently lobbied for the holiday, and musician Stevie Wonder contributed to the movement with his song "Happy Birthday" to rally support.

By the 1980s, shifts in American society made it more receptive to honoring King. Public sentiment had changed, and there was growing regret over the Vietnam War. Momentum for the holiday increased. In 1983, 20 years after King’s famous speech, Congress passed the legislation, and President Ronald Reagan signed it into law.

Despite federal recognition, not all states immediately observed the holiday. Many, particularly in the South, resisted. Arizona became a focal point of controversy when Governor Evan Mecham rescinded the holiday in 1987, saying that Black people needed jobs, not a holiday. His decision sparked protests led by figures such as Dr. Warren H. Stewart Sr., and major entertainers canceled events in Arizona. Businesses withdrew conventions, and when the state lost the opportunity to host the Super Bowl, public pressure mounted. In 1992, Arizona voters reinstated the holiday through a ballot initiative.

Elsewhere, states gradually followed suit. South Carolina was the last to fully recognize the holiday in 2000, though it did so alongside Confederate Memorial Day, a decision that disappointed many civil rights activists.

Over the past 42 years, Martin Luther King Jr. Day has expanded beyond its original purpose. Unlike other federal holidays, it encourages participation rather than just observance. In 1994, President Bill Clinton signed legislation introduced by Congressman John Lewis and Senator Harris Wofford, designating it as a National Day of Service.

Cities and communities across the country now celebrate with parades, street festivals, and concerts, while service projects include community clean-ups, food donations, and blood drives. AmeriCorps, a federal agency supporting volunteer efforts, has distributed millions in grants to nonprofits and faith-based organizations, leading to thousands of service initiatives engaging hundreds of thousands of people each year. The holiday’s impact continues to grow, inspiring acts of service beyond just one day.

Rev. Bernice King, CEO of the King Center in Atlanta, hopes people go beyond quoting her father and instead commit to embodying his principles of nonviolence and justice daily. Scholars, including Lerone Martin of Stanford University’s Martin Luther King, Jr. Research and Education Institute, stress the importance of studying King’s writings, such as his 1963 "Letter from Birmingham Jail."

By understanding and internalizing his ideals, people can continue a dialogue with King—not just on one day but throughout the year.

link.title: Martin Luther King Jr. Day is both a U.S. holiday and a national day of service, but it took the nation many years to officially recognize it.

category.term: Los Angeles will face another round of fire

entry.title: Los Angeles is bracing for another surge of powerful, fire-stoking Santa Ana winds this week.
entry.content:
Los Angeles is bracing for another surge of powerful, fire-stoking Santa Ana winds this week.

Charred trees from the Palisades Fire stand amid swirling dust carried by the fierce Santa Ana winds at Will Rogers State Park in Los Angeles last week.

Los Angeles County has been battling deadly wildfires, and while firefighters have made progress during a temporary break from severe weather, another round of dangerous Santa Ana winds is expected to intensify fire risks. The National Weather Service has issued red flag warnings from Monday afternoon through Tuesday morning for much of the foothills and mountainous regions of Los Angeles and Ventura counties, including Malibu. These warnings indicate a heightened risk of fire due to strong winds and extremely low humidity levels. The fire-fueling conditions are expected to persist through Thursday, with some areas experiencing humidity levels as low as 2% to 5%.

Officials warn that the combination of exceptionally dry vegetation and powerful winds will create the potential for rapid fire spread. The Storm Prediction Center has classified parts of the San Gabriel Mountains and surrounding areas, including the Malibu coast, as an “extremely critical” fire zone. Winds are expected to peak Monday afternoon and evening, continuing into early Tuesday, with this Santa Ana wind event potentially lasting through midweek. Northeast winds will strengthen Monday night, reaching speeds between 35 and 50 mph in the mountains and foothills, while widespread gusts could range from 60 to 80 mph. Some areas, such as the San Gabriels and Santa Susanas, may see isolated gusts reaching 100 mph. Coastal and valley regions will experience winds between 25 and 40 mph, with peak gusts between 50 and 70 mph.

California Governor Gavin Newsom has announced the deployment of more than 130 fire engines, water tenders, and aircraft to Southern California. Adding to the challenges, nearly all of Southern California is experiencing severe drought conditions, and no rain is forecasted for the week. Downtown Los Angeles has received just 0.16 inches of rain since October 1, while Los Angeles International Airport has recorded a mere 0.03 inches. This marks the driest start to a year on record for the region. The US Drought Monitor reports that 90% of Los Angeles County is now classified under severe drought, a sharp increase from the previous month when no such conditions were recorded.

Firefighters continue efforts to contain the Palisades Fire, which has burned 23,713 acres and is now 56% contained. Meanwhile, the Eaton Fire, which has scorched 14,021 acres, is at 81% containment. These fires have led to devastating consequences, with at least 27 people confirmed dead and thousands of homes destroyed. As of Saturday, approximately 41,000 people remained under evacuation orders or warnings in Los Angeles County. While some areas, such as parts of Altadena, have been reopened to residents, many others remain restricted. Fire officials estimate that it will take at least another week before it is safe for residents to return to their homes and assess the damage.

The Federal Emergency Management Agency (FEMA) has already distributed more than $32 million in aid to wildfire survivors. Meanwhile, Pasadena has announced red flag parking restrictions starting Monday to facilitate emergency access and evacuations in high-risk areas. City officials emphasize that their goal is to ensure residents are prepared for worsening conditions. In addition to the fire risk, the Los Angeles County Department of Public Health has issued an advisory warning residents of windblown dust and ash, which pose health risks.

Concerns have been raised about the preparedness of the Los Angeles Fire Department in handling the ongoing wildfire crisis. Two years ago, Fire Chief Kristin Crowley warned city leaders that the absence of a regularly staffed wildland hand crew could lead to containment issues. The city relies on a part-time, volunteer hand crew, mostly made up of teenagers, who use basic tools like axes and shovels to combat wildfires. When the Palisades Fire broke out on January 7, no professional Los Angeles Fire Department unit was available for an immediate response, leaving crews from Los Angeles County and the state to take initial action.

The lack of resources has led to criticism of city leadership, particularly Los Angeles Mayor Karen Bass, who has faced scrutiny over the timing of an overseas trip and budget cuts that impacted the fire department. However, a spokesperson for the mayor’s office emphasized that funding for wildland hand crews has since been quadrupled, with efforts accelerating in response to worsening climate conditions. A CNN analysis of fire department staffing in the ten largest US cities indicates that the Los Angeles Fire Department is among the least staffed, raising further concerns about the city’s ability to respond effectively to large-scale wildfire events.

link.title: Los Angeles is bracing for another surge of powerful, fire-stoking Santa Ana winds this week.

entry.title: Kerala Woman Sentenced to Death for Poisoning Boyfriend to End Relationship
entry.content:
Kerala Woman Sentenced to Death for Poisoning Boyfriend to End Relationship

In 2022, Greeshma fatally poisoned her boyfriend by lacing an ayurvedic tonic with paraquat, a toxic herbicide.
The woman poisoned her boyfriend in an attempt to end their relationship.

A 24-year-old woman in Kerala, Greeshma, has been sentenced to death for the murder of her boyfriend, Sharon Raj, nearly two years after the crime. The verdict, delivered on Monday, comes after the court found her guilty of poisoning the 23-year-old in an attempt to end their relationship.

According to the prosecution, Greeshma had plotted the murder after Raj refused to break up with her. Her marriage had already been arranged with an army officer from Tamil Nadu, leading her to take drastic measures. In 2022, she laced an ayurvedic tonic with paraquat, a highly toxic herbicide, and gave it to Raj. He suffered multiple organ failure and died 11 days later.

Officials revealed that this was not her first attempt to poison him. Earlier, she had tried mixing crushed paracetamol tablets in his fruit juice, but Raj refused to drink it due to its bitter taste. >

During the sentencing, Greeshma pleaded for leniency, citing her academic achievements, lack of a prior criminal record, and the fact that she is her parents' only daughter. However, the court rejected these arguments, emphasizing the gravity of the crime and stating that her age was not a factor that warranted leniency.

The prosecution presented circumstantial, digital, and scientific evidence to prove the crime. Following the verdict, Special Public Prosecutor VS Vineeth Kumar expressed confidence in the court’s decision, stating that this case fell under the "rarest of the rare" category and deserved capital punishment.

Sharon Raj, a BSc Radiology student from Parassala in Thiruvananthapuram district, lost his life due to Greeshma’s calculated actions. Her uncle, Nirmalakumaran Nair, was also convicted for destroying evidence, while her mother, initially taken into custody, was acquitted due to a lack of evidence. The case serves as a grim reminder of how love, betrayal, and desperation can lead to tragic consequences.

link.title: Kerala Woman Sentenced to Death for Poisoning Boyfriend to End Relationship

entry.title: Egg Recall in Ontario and Other Provinces Due to Salmonella
entry.content:
Egg Recall in Ontario and Other Provinces Due to Salmonella

Burnbrae Farms Issues Nationwide Recall

Eggs sold in Ontario, British Columbia, Manitoba, and possibly other provinces have been recalled due to potential salmonella contamination. The recall, issued by Burnbrae Farms, affects multiple brands, including Compliments, Foremost, Golden Valley Eggs, IGA, No Name, and Western Family.

 

Retailers and Affected Products

The recalled eggs were sold at major grocery chains such as Walmart, Loblaw, Sobeys, and No Frills. The affected products have best-before dates of February 16, February 22, and March 1.

CFIA Warning and Safety Measures

The Canadian Food Inspection Agency (CFIA) issued a Class 2 recall after testing identified the presence of salmonella. Although no reported illnesses have been linked to the recall, the CFIA is investigating the issue and ensuring that the recalled products are removed from store shelves.

Health officials warn that contaminated eggs may not look or smell spoiled but can cause serious illness, particularly in young children, pregnant women, seniors, and those with weakened immune systems. Symptoms of salmonella infection include:

 


  • Fever
  • Headache
  • Vomiting
  • Nausea
  • Stomach cramps
  • Diarrhea
  • In severe cases, long-term complications such as arthritis

Consumer Advisory

The CFIA advises consumers not to eat, serve, or sell the recalled eggs. Those who have purchased affected batches should dispose of them immediately or return them to the store for a refund. Anyone who experiences symptoms after consuming the recalled eggs should seek medical attention.

List of Recalled Eggs  


Compliments

  • Extra Large White Eggs (12) – UPC 0 55742 35751 6, Best Before Feb. 22
  • Large White Eggs (12) – UPC 0 55742 35750 9, Best Before March 1
  • Large White Eggs (18) – UPC 0 55742 35756 1, Best Before March 1


Foremost  


  • Large Eggs (18) – UPC 0 61483 05666 3, Best Before Feb. 22


Golden Valley Eggs

  • Extra Large Eggs (30) – UPC 0 55799 10301 2, Best Before March 1
  • Jumbo Eggs (20) – UPC 0 55799 10310 4, Best Before Feb. 22

  •  
  • Large Eggs (2 x 30) – UPC 0 55799 10503 0, Best Before Feb. 22
  • Large Eggs (30) – UPC 0 55799 10303 6, Best Before March 1
  • White Extra Large Eggs (18) – UPC 0 55799 11101 7, Best Before March 1
  • White Large Eggs (12) – UPC 0 55799 10103 2, Best Before March 1

IGA

  • Extra Large Eggs (12) – UPC 0 55742 05119 3, Best Before Feb. 22
  • No Name
  • Large Eggs (12) – UPC 0 60383 66414 5, Best Before March 1
  • Large Eggs (30) – UPC 0 60383 22293 2, Best Before Feb. 22, March 1
  • Large Eggs (30) – UPC 0 60383 22293 2, Best Before Feb. 16

Western Family

  • Extra Large White Eggs (12) – UPC 0 62639 41011 7, Best Before Feb. 22, March 1
  • Large White Eggs (30) – UPC 0 62639 39498 1, Best Before March 1
  •  

Next Steps

Consumers are urged to check their egg cartons for the lot numbers and UPCs listed above. If you have any of the recalled eggs in your home, discard them or return them to the place of purchase.

For more information, visit the CFIA website or contact your local health authorities.

link.title: Egg Recall in Ontario and Other Provinces Due to Salmonella

entry.title: Canada to Host a Unique Inauguration Day Celebration in Washington
entry.content:
Canada to Hold an Unusual Inauguration Day Party in Washington

A Distinctive Celebration in the U.S. Capital

As the United States prepares for its Inauguration Day, Canada is planning a unique celebration in Washington, D.C. The Canadian Embassy, a symbol of the strong bilateral relationship between the two countries, has announced an event that will stand out from past traditions.

Highlighting Canada-U.S. Relations

The event aims to reinforce the deep ties between Canada and the United States, showcasing Canadian culture while marking the transition of power in the U.S. administration. Canadian officials have emphasized that the gathering is not just about politics but also about friendship, trade, and shared values.

What to Expect at the Event

Although specific details remain undisclosed, sources suggest the celebration will feature Canadian delicacies, musical performances by prominent Canadian artists, and an exhibit on historic moments in Canada-U.S. diplomacy. High-profile guests from both sides of the border are also expected to attend.

A Departure from Tradition

Unlike previous inauguration receptions, this year’s event will incorporate interactive experiences such as a virtual reality tour of Canada’s iconic landmarks and live-streamed discussions on key bilateral issues, including trade, security, and environmental cooperation. By broadening its approach, Canada hopes to engage not only policymakers but also the general public.

A Symbol of Unity and Partnership

In a time of global uncertainty, this distinctive celebration serves as a symbolic gesture of Canada’s commitment to its closest ally. As the world watches the U.S. political transition, Canada’s inauguration event in Washington underscores the enduring partnership between the two nations.

The celebration is set to take place at the Canadian Embassy on Inauguration Day, promising an evening of diplomacy, culture, and camaraderie.

link.title: Canada to Host a Unique Inauguration Day Celebration in Washington

entry.title: TikTok Ban: Apple Issues ‘Unprecedented’ Response for iPhone Users : USA
entry.content:
TikTok Ban: Apple Issues ‘Unprecedented’ Response for iPhone Users

The ongoing debate over TikTok’s future in the United States has taken a dramatic turn, with Apple issuing an unprecedented response that could have major implications for iPhone users. As concerns over national security and data privacy intensify, Apple has broken its usual silence on app bans to address the potential removal of TikTok from the App Store.

Apple’s Statement: A Rare Move

Apple, known for its tight-lipped approach on controversial topics, made an unusual public statement regarding the potential TikTok ban. The tech giant emphasized its commitment to user choice and a secure digital ecosystem. While Apple did not take a definitive stance on whether TikTok should be banned, the company reassured iPhone users that it is actively monitoring developments and will comply with any legal requirements set by the U.S. government.

What This Means for iPhone Users

If the U.S. government moves forward with a nationwide ban, TikTok could be removed from the App Store, making it inaccessible for new downloads and updates. However, existing users might still be able to use the app unless Apple is forced to block access entirely. 

Apple’s response also highlights its broader concerns about setting a precedent for app removals. The company has long positioned itself as a champion of digital rights, and a forced TikTok ban could raise questions about future app store restrictions and governmental influence over the tech industry.

The Bigger Picture: National Security vs. Digital Freedom

The TikTok controversy centers on fears that the Chinese-owned app could pose a security risk by collecting data on American users. Lawmakers have proposed legislation to force ByteDance, TikTok’s parent company, to sell its U.S. operations to an American firm or face a ban. While TikTok denies any wrongdoing, the pressure continues to mount.

Apple’s involvement in the discussion signals how serious the issue has become. As one of the most influential tech companies in the world, Apple’s response could shape how other tech giants, such as Google, respond to similar situations in the future. 

What’s Next?

For now, iPhone users can continue using TikTok without interruption. However, if the ban proceeds, Apple may need to take drastic measures. Users concerned about losing access to TikTok should stay informed about legal proceedings and possible workarounds, such as using VPN services or alternative app stores.

As the situation evolves, Apple’s rare intervention suggests that the battle over TikTok is more than just a legal dispute—it’s a defining moment for digital freedom in the U.S. The coming weeks will be crucial in determining whether TikTok remains available or if iPhone users will have to say goodbye to the popular app.

link.title: TikTok Ban: Apple Issues ‘Unprecedented’ Response for iPhone Users : USA

entry.title: New plant species discovered in Nagaland
entry.content:
New Plant Species ‘Aeschynanthus clarkei’ Discovered in Nagaland


A new species belonging to the Aeschynanthus genus, named Aeschynanthus clarkei sp. nov., has been discovered in Nagaland. The recent scientific publication documenting the species adds to the region’s growing botanical diversity.

Rare and Critically Endangered Species 

The newly identified species is found in a small population in the Kiphire district, growing in two localities with approximately 35 mature individuals. Due to its limited distribution and small population, it has been provisionally assessed as Critically Endangered under the IUCN Red List (B2ab(III); D).

Morphologically, Aeschynanthus clarkei closely resembles Aeschynanthus lineatus Craib, particularly in its sessile inflorescences. This discovery not only highlights the rich biodiversity of Nagaland but also emphasizes the urgent need for conservation to protect this rare species and its fragile habitat.


O

link.title: New plant species discovered in Nagaland

entry.title: Narayana Murthy’s Infosys Announces Salary Hike for Employees
entry.content:
Narayana Murthy’s Infosys Announces Salary Hike for Employees

Employees in India to Receive 6-8% Pay Increase

Infosys, co-founded by Narayana Murthy, has announced a salary hike of 6-8% for employees in India as part of its phased salary revision plan. The increments will take effect in January 2025, with a second phase scheduled for April 2025.

Lower Salary Hikes for Overseas Employees

While employees in India will benefit from a higher percentage hike, those based outside the country will receive lower, single-digit increments. This follows the company's cautious approach to compensation adjustments amid global economic uncertainties.

CFO Jayesh Sanghrajka’s Statement

During the company’s Q3FY25 results briefing, Infosys' Chief Financial Officer (CFO), Jayesh Sanghrajka, confirmed the salary hike, stating:

“Broadly, we expect 6-8% increments in India, and overseas adjustments will follow earlier patterns.”

Infosys, which employs over 3.23 lakh professionals, had delayed salary hikes to the fourth quarter of FY25 due to slower IT spending and global challenges. The last salary revision was implemented in November 2023. 

Impact on Profitability and Future Outlook

Infosys has not disclosed the exact impact of these wage hikes on its profit margins. However, Sanghrajka warned of possible headwinds in Q4FY25 and Q1FY26 due to increased employee costs.

CEO Salil Parekh assured that high-performing employees would receive higher salary increments, reinforcing the company’s commitment to retaining top talent.

Infosys Reports Strong Q3FY25 Performance

https://www.profitablecpmrate.com/x0km2svf8?key=35df624a2bf9e68ca30b77587522acf6

Despite economic uncertainties, Infosys delivered strong financial results in Q3FY25:

  • Net Profit: Rs 6,806 crore, reflecting an 11.4% year-on-year increase
  • Revenue from Operations: Rs 41,764 crore, up 7.5% from Rs 38,821 crore in Q3FY24

With this salary revision, Infosys aims to boost employee morale and retain top talent while navigating the challenges of the global IT industry.

entry.title: Abel Demands Another Center Forward at Palmeiras
entry.content:
Abel Demands Another Center Forward at Palmeiras, Urges Club to Strengthen Squad

Palmeiras head coach Abel Ferreira has made it clear that he wants reinforcements in the attack, specifically another center forward, as the team prepares for the challenges ahead. The Portuguese manager emphasized the need for the club’s management to make an "effort" in securing new signings.

Abel’s Concern Over Squad Depth

Speaking to the media, Abel expressed his concerns about the squad’s depth, particularly in the striker position. Despite Palmeiras having a strong squad, he believes an additional center forward is crucial for maintaining competitiveness in multiple tournaments.

"We need reinforcements, especially in the attack. The season is long, and injuries, suspensions, and fatigue will come. If we want to keep fighting for titles, we must strengthen the team," Abel stated.

Palmeiras’ Transfer Strategy

Palmeiras has been active in the transfer market, but securing a quality striker remains a challenge. The club is reportedly evaluating several options, with discussions ongoing to bring in a prolific goal scorer. Abel has urged the board to accelerate negotiations to ensure the squad is ready for the upcoming fixtures.

"I understand the financial challenges, but if we want to keep winning, we must make an effort. The fans deserve a strong team, and we need solutions in the attack," he added.

Upcoming Challenges for Palmeiras

With Palmeiras competing in multiple tournaments, including the Brasileirão, Copa Libertadores, and domestic cups, squad rotation will be essential. Abel's demand highlights his determination to keep Palmeiras at the top, ensuring they remain title contenders on all fronts.

The coming weeks will be crucial as Palmeiras looks to secure signings and strengthen their squad ahead of a demanding season.

link.title: Abel Demands Another Center Forward at Palmeiras

entry.title: Barcelona Held to a Draw at Getafe Amid Racist Abuse Incident
entry.content:
Barcelona Held to a Draw at Getafe Amid Racist Abuse Incident

Balde Reports Racist Abuse During Match

Barcelona's frustrating night at Getafe took a darker turn when full-back Alejandro Balde revealed he was subjected to racist abuse from fans. The young defender informed the referee during the game, prompting an official stadium announcement.

Speaking to Movistar, Balde stated:
"I received various racist insults from some fans today, and I think that's something I should say here. I think it's something that should not keep happening."

Hansi Flick Condemns Racism

Barcelona manager Hansi Flick strongly condemned the incident, saying:
"There's no space for this in football or in life. This is unbelievable—in the time we live in now, it's totally wrong. They have to stay at home, not go to the match. We have to fight against them, and the people around them can also do something. I think everyone can do it."

Barcelona Drop More Points in La Liga

Despite recent success in the Copa del Rey and Spanish Super Cup, Barcelona’s struggles in La Liga continued as they failed to secure a win for the fourth consecutive league match.

The visitors started brightly, with Jules Koundé opening the scoring after David Soria initially saved his first attempt. However, Getafe responded through Mauro Arambarri, who capitalized on a rebound after Iñaki Peña parried Coba da Costa’s shot.

Frenkie de Jong came close to securing all three points for Barcelona, but his powerful strike was denied by an impressive diving save from Soria.

League Standings and Getafe's Resilience

Barcelona remain third in La Liga, now five points behind Atlético Madrid, who suffered a surprising defeat to Leganés earlier in the day. Meanwhile, Getafe extended their strong home record against Barça, remaining unbeaten in their last five league meetings at the Coliseum Alfonso Pérez. They now sit just one point above the relegation zone.

 


O

link.title: Barcelona Held to a Draw at Getafe Amid Racist Abuse Incident

entry.title: The Israel-Hamas ceasefire will take effect Sunday morning.
entry.content:
The Israel-Hamas ceasefire will take effect Sunday morning.

Break in the Violence

A ceasefire between Israel and Hamas will go into effect Sunday morning, as confirmed by officials from both sides. The truce comes after weeks of intense fighting that has led to significant casualties and widespread destruction, particularly in the Gaza Strip. This announcement brings a momentary halt to the violence, offering hope for some relief to civilians trapped in the conflict zones.

Terms of the Ceasefire

While the specifics of the ceasefire agreement have not been fully disclosed, both Israeli and Hamas representatives have expressed a willingness to abide by the terms, which are aimed at reducing hostilities and allowing for the delivery of humanitarian aid. The ceasefire is expected to last for several days, although the potential for its extension remains uncertain.

Humanitarian Concerns

The ceasefire has been welcomed by international organizations, which have been urging both parties to prioritize the safety and well-being of civilians. In Gaza, the humanitarian situation has reached a crisis point, with hospitals overwhelmed and basic supplies running low. The truce is seen as a critical opportunity to provide aid to those affected by the conflict.

Looking Ahead                                                                                    

As the ceasefire goes into effect, many are cautiously optimistic but remain wary of the fragile nature of such agreements. The international community continues to call for long-term peace efforts to address the underlying issues of the Israel-Hamas conflict, hoping that this temporary pause in violence could pave the way for broader negotiations.

link.title: The Israel-Hamas ceasefire will take effect Sunday morning.

entry.title: Donald Trump Unveils $TRUMP Meme Coin: Revolutionary Investment or Political Stunt?
entry.content:
Donald Trump Unveils $TRUMP Meme Coin: Revolutionary Investment or Political Stunt?



A Controversial Entry into the Crypto World

In a surprising move, Donald Trump has introduced $TRUMP, a meme coin that has quickly captured global attention. But is this digital asset a revolutionary financial opportunity or just another campaign stunt?

The Explosive Rise of $TRUMP

Within hours of its launch, $TRUMP’s market cap skyrocketed to $8 billion, with trading volumes surpassing $1 billion. The price of the token surged by over 300%, jumping from $0.18 to $7.1. Stories of quick profits emerged, with one trader allegedly earning $20 million in under an hour.

The Inspiration Behind $TRUMP


The meme coin draws inspiration from Trump’s “Fight, Fight, Fight” rallying cry, which he reportedly shouted after surviving an assassination attempt at a Pennsylvania event in July 2024. The coin’s launch aligns with his brand of bold and unconventional marketing strategies.

Who Controls $TRUMP?

$TRUMP launched with 200 million coins, out of a planned 1 billion total supply. A significant 80% of the tokens are owned by CIC Digital LLC, an affiliate of The Trump Organization, and Fight Fight Fight LLC, a recently registered Delaware entity.

Skepticism and Legitimacy Concerns

Despite its rapid success, questions remain about the legitimacy of $TRUMP. The coin’s official site states that it is “not political”, yet concerns persist over potential hacks, fraud, and financial manipulation.

Trump’s History with Unusual Merchandise

From $100,000 watches to assassination attempt cologne, Trump has a history of launching unique products. This latest crypto venture follows similar trends, sparking both excitement and doubt in the market.

The Verdict: Boom or Bust? hao

While $TRUMP is currently dominating discussions, its long-term value remains uncertain. Will it be a crypto sensation or just another fleeting headline in Trump’s legacy? Time will tell.
